channel.title: Client help PLEASE

item.title: Client help PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @adam3d90s adam3d90s
item.description:
@adam3d90s wrote:

OK this is verry inportant i have a server and people are loging in with owners names like …god or @god or with spaces I need to fix this because there scamming my players there taking runescape accounts for staff… but i dont take rs accounts for staff they have to earn it… HOw can i stop them from creating the fake accounts… here is the one sorce from my client file…

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("g0d") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("god")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

Can some one help me fix it so it works or tell me a way i can block them from using owners/admins names!!! I DONT WANT MY PLAYERS TO GET SCAMMED ANY MORE…

Thank You,

Adam D.

Read full topic
